forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. Rain showers early then becoming windy with mainly overcast skies for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning, then remaining overcast and windy during the afternoon hours. High 63F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain. Low 11C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 46F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. High 54F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 45F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 43F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 42F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High near 15C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 59F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 63F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 61F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
